body.name: CUBOT Unlocked Mobile Phone, Pocket, SIM-Free Mini Smartphone, 4GB RAM+64GB, 128GB Extension, Android 11, 4.0 inch Screen, 16MP Camera, 3000mAh, Face ID/NFC/GPS (Green+Gold)
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 31 mins
FREE pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 31 mins
features: 【4 inch Small Screen】Mobile phone adopts a 4-inch small screen design, palm-sized, can be easily held in the hand, convenient for one-handed use. You can easily put it in your pocket without hindering your actions.

【Android 11 System】Android phones are equipped with the latest Android 11 system, which runs smoother and faster. Powered by a quad-core processor, it will provide enough performance to run smoothly. This smartphone support carriers AT&T, T-Mobile, Metro PCS, Straight Talk, Mint Mobile and so on. Do not work with CDMA service providers like Verizon, Sprint, Cricket, Boost Mobile, U.S.Cellular.

【128GB Extended】This small phone has 4GB RAM and 64GB ROM, which is larger storage than many small phones, and supports TF card to expand the memory to 128GB, install applications, download pictures and videos as you like. CUBOT phone also supports dual cards and 3G Global Bands.
【3000mAh Battery】This mini smartphone comes with a 3000mAh battery that is enough to support your daily use. It will back you up to finish your work, spend your enjoyable game time.
【Multiple Uses】CUBOT POCKET mobile phone is small, convenient and light. You can use it as a backup phone. Simple operation, very suitable for the elderly and children.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The high-quality and high-tech products developed by the CUBOT team have been exported to America, Europe, Japan and other parts of the world. If you have any questions after receiving the product, please feel free to consult us! 4G Band: GSM: 850/900/1800/1900MHz WCDMA: 900/2100MHZ FDD: B1/3/7/8/19/20 It can support the use of two SIM cards and one TF card. 128GB expandable.

4 inch Pocket Smartphone The 4-inch pocket smartphone can be controlled with one hand, and the smooth lines of the back make it comfortable to hold. CUBOT 4GB+64GB With 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB of storage capacity, a large number of applications run smoothly. 3000mAh Battery This small smartphone contains 3000mAh battery. You don't have to worry about running out of battery. Face ID Whether it's unlocking your phone or paying, Face id can help you do it quickly and safely GPS ‘’Does cubot pocket support GPS?’’"Yes, (GPS+GLONASS) built, also supports A-GPS.’’ Camera 16MP main camera, 5MP front camera, Never miss a beautiful moment.

Specifications Size 119 *58 *12.5mm Screen size 4 inch RAM + ROM 4GB+64GB Resolution 3000mAh CPU T310 Quad processor Resolution 540*1080 pixels Band GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz WCDMA 900/2100MHZ FDD: 1/3/5/7/8/19/20 TDD: B40 Camera 16MP Main camera + 5MP Front camera SIM Dual Nano SIM Card or 1 * Sim Card and 1 * TF card GPS GPS + A-GPS Package include Pocket Smartphone, Protect Case, Charger, Type-C Cable, SIM Eject Pin, User Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Compatiable with AT&T
reviews.reviewText: Took the phone to local AT&T store and was informed Cubot Pocket was not compatible What a shame , its a nice phone !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not USA compatible - sad
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size and decent phone... but, LTE bands 1/3/5/7/8/19/20 ... only 5 works in the USA. Even t-mo won't work. No fault on the phone, just no compatible technology. Please, make a Verizon LTE band 13 version?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but expensive for no performance as expected. Not even NORMAL, so far.
reviews.reviewText: Cute, but that's it. Already having problems with screen going off and on, AND TRIED ALL FIXES off Internet already. Will try for another day or so and see if it'll work normal; if not, returning. Again, great size, and I knew its performance is 1/3 of what I once had, but still want it to work properly. ESPECIALLY for the price. Could've got a brand new CUBOT KINGKONG of what I did have for less than the price of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for something small it's pretty good but thick..My complaint,was told it was good for AT&T..I have H2O Wireless that uses AT&T..Put my sim in and no signal..After messing with APN Address changes and a long session with H2O was told it didn't have compatible channels to work on their system..I was real upset.. After messing with it for hours I tried restarts and more APN changes..dismounting the sim and more restarts.. Finally toggled VOLTE on and off several times doing the same with airplane mode.. Magically the VOLTE Icon popped up on the top corner and it works perfectly..I just wanted an updated hideaway cell because they aren't around anymore that's affordable..This is it..But hopefully you have better luck with the setup..Mine came with a clear protective skin..An installed screen protective cover..A nice set of earphones that plug into the usb-C charging slot..They work well.. It's not setup for 3.5mm headphones..The extras I value at 20$ or more.. Hope this helps

reviews.reviewTitle: La batterie se décharge assez vite.
reviews.reviewText: Pourrait être très bien si la batterie ne se déchargeait pas aussi vite et pas moyen qu'il se mette en 4G, il reste toujours en 3G malgré les réglages.

Also zuerst muss ich sagen, Super Smartphone für das Geld.8 Gigabyte RAM und 128 GB Festpeicher.Guter Prozessor Helios P60 / 8 X 2 GHz.Und ein Full HD+ Display.Die 60hz sind allemal ausreichend.Apps öffnen Zügig Dank 8GB RAM.Und 128 GB Festpeicher reicht auch Locker in der heutigen Zeit.Dank dualsim Funktion und oder Eine Sim und eine Micro SD Karte kann verwendet werden.Das Display ist Farbenfroh und Kräftig.Die Kameras sind auch Gut.Voralen die hauptkamera mit 48 Megapixel von Samsung,macht gute brauchbare Fotos.Eine weitwinkelkamera ist auch an Board mit 16 Megapixel.Erstaunlich gut ist die Makro Kamera.Und der nachtmodus ist auch gut.Insgesamt sind 5 Kameras hinten Verbaut.Und eine 32 Megapixel Kamera für Selfies auf der Vorderseite.An Kameras haben sie nicht gespart.Die 48 Megapixel Kamera hinten ist übrigens auch im S10 Lite verbaut,Kann nur ein gutes Zeichen sein.Cubot hat anscheinend an der Ausstattung nicht gespart. Viel Speicher und RAM.Größe des Smartphones ist mit 6,4 Zoll auch anständig Groß.Alles in allem ein gelungenes Smartphone.Steht den Großen in nichts nach.Die C5, W03 und C3 SmartWatches hab ich mir auch gegönnt zum anschauen,Kosten nicht viel aber haben auch einiges zu bieten.....X30 ist sehr zu empfehlen.X50 IST AUCH GUT.UND WER AUF RIESIGE SMARTPHONES STEHT MAX 3 VON CUBOT.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo smartphone, veloce e ottima fotocamera
reviews.reviewText: Lo consiglio vivamente a chi non vuole spendere troppo per avere uno smartphone di fascia medio alta. Veloce, ottima durata della batteria e qualità elevata della fotocamera e dello schermo. Forse un po' troppo elevato lo spessore.
la qualità delle 5 fotocamere derivazione Samsung, benissimo per chi non ha pretese maniacali fotografiche
le son du haut-parleur pas très puissant pour une conversation ,mais fait le boulot
